page.title: 17A walk in the Country.
page.content: On the 17th of May, 1985, classes 2 and 3 went for a walk for the Domesday Project, with their teachers, Mr Mantle and Mr Burns. Everyone had maps at the ready. We all gathered up inside the school and off we trooped! My partner was Craig Rees but we ended up with Neil Spragg as well. We walked to the playground to the wall which led us to the field. As the sun was beaming down on the earth, my mum put me in shorts, but someone had not bothered to cut the grass, so the ones wearing shorts and skirts were in for a pretty itchy time! Along we trecked until the ground became hard. Soon the grass had formed a hard, rough, dusty surface, with stones all over the place. I was free from itchy grass on my legs so now I could have a nice, relaxing chat with Craig & Neil.
